page.title: 07Leisure in Brookmans Park
page.content: There are some small tennis courts where people go to play.To be allowed to play you must wear whites and be a member or be accompanied by a member. There is a golf course but you have to be a member in order to play as well as being over thirteen years of age.There is a clubhouse where food and drink can be purchased. There is a large open space with two football goals and a lightly marked pitch. The activities that take place in the village are mostly organised by the people themselves,through the schools,the church or the other organizations that can be found in the village. There are few commercially organised entertainments and people have to travel to nearby towns or to London for them.
